remarks: The set of all 1-dim subspaces (atoms) of a left module or left vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Apr-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2015.)
statement:
lsatset.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lsatset.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lsatset.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lsatset.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) $.
lsatset $p |- ( W e. X -> A = ran ( v e. ( V \ { .0. } ) |-> ( N ` { v } ) ) ) $.
$d .0. v $.
$d N v $.
$d V v $.
$d W v $.
$d X v $.
